item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction I’ve finally decided to retire my old Tumblr page. It’s honestly surprising that it’s still functioning after a decade of neglect, but the time has come to move on. I’m transitioning to Hugo, a static site generator. I chose Hugo for my new website because it allows me to host it for free, and a static site offers the scalability and longevity I’m looking for. More complex setups eventually break down as frameworks become obsolete.
